alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 4:12PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila, Eastern Maricopa and Eastern Pinal Counties through 500 PM MST... At 412 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Top-Of-The-World to 8 miles northwest of Kearny. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Globe, Superior, Miami, Top Of The World, Cutter, Central Heights-Midland City, Top-Of-The-World, Claypool and Inspiration. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 227 and 281. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 267. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 152 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Superior; Tonto Basin
